Title: Darwin's tubercle
Content: Darwins tubercle or auricular tubercle is a congenital ear condition which often presents as a thickening on the helix at the junction of the upper and middle thirds. The trait can potentially be bilateral meaning present on both ears or unilateral where it is present on only one ear. It is present in approximately 104 of the Spanish adult population 40 of adults in India and 58 of Swedish school children.
